attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
B-Sky-B and Virgin Media - A plague upon both your houses:

a. While Virgin Media promise great things from "on-demand" it's not here yet, but I'm still being charged for the old provision.

b. Previously I could get B-Sky-B's standard output via On-Digital or NTL (but now they're both dead)  - Can we spell anti-competitive practises?

Motion - Metaphorically, this government should slap both Virgin and Sky about the head until they return to providing us consumers with a meaningful choice of suppliers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
